welcomeScreens.welcomeDesc1: Get rewarded for shopping at your favorite stores. Earn cashback with every transaction, both online and in-store.
welcomeScreens.welcomeDesc2: Browse through thousands of stores offering special deals, coupons, and discounts just for you.
welcomeScreens.welcomeDesc3: Easily monitor your cashback balance and redeem your earnings through PayPal or other options

forgotPassword.heading: Don’t worry. Enter your email and we’ll send you a link to reset your password.

emailSent.heading: Your email is on the way
emailSent.description: Check your email test@test.com and follow the instructions to reset your password
